name: Albums.Attributes
desc: The attributes for an album resource.

items.name: artistName
items.desc: The name of the primary artist associated with the album.

items.name: artistUrl
items.desc: (Extended) The url of the artist for this content.

items.name: contentRating
items.desc: The Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) rating of the content. The possible values for this rating are clean and explicit. No value means no rating.

items.name: editorialNotes
items.desc: The notes about the album that appear in the iTunes Store.

items.name: genreNames
items.desc: The names of the genres associated with this album.

items.name: isCompilation
items.desc: Indicates if the album is marked as a compilation. If true, the album is a compilation; otherwise, it is not.

items.name: isComplete
items.desc: Indicates whether the album is complete. If true, the album is complete; otherwise, it is not. An album is complete if it contains all its tracks and songs.

items.name: isMasteredForItunes
items.desc: Indicates whether the response delivered the album as an Apple Digital Master.

items.name: isSingle
items.desc: Indicates whether the album contains a single song.

items.name: name
items.desc: The localized name of the album.

items.name: playParams
items.desc: The parameters to use to play back the tracks of the album.

items.name: recordLabel
items.desc: The name of the record label for the album.

items.name: releaseDate
items.desc: The release date of the album, when known, in YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY format. Pre-release content may have an expected release date in the future.

items.name: upc
items.desc: The Universal Product Code for the album.

items.name: url
items.desc: The URL for sharing the album in Apple Music.
